a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share with alcohol or drug use disorders, men vs. women, 2021
Alcohol or drug use dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of
three or more indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year. Tobacco smoking is not
Share of women with alcohol or drug use disorders
Share of men with alcohol or drug use disorders
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
